page.title: 05A Day at Ropley School
page.content: We arrive at school at about 8.40 and play in the playground until the bell rings at 8.55.when we go to our class for registration.On Mondays & Fridays we have assembly but on the other days we start work straight away.Our class of 35 children is in 5 working groups each with a different timetable.When our teacher is not teaching our group we have to get on with our set work. Groups also listen to tapes and use the computer.We have two computers in school and we have one in our room on Thursday and Friday.We watch schools television programmes too.There are playtimes in the middle of the morning & afternoon.Lunchtime is from 12.10 to 1.15 and we have school lunch or bring sandwiches.Work is easier after lunch & we have games,P.E.,Art/Craft,Music etc.School finishes at 3.30 but we still have our homework to do.
